text: The Actor and the Savages () is a 1975 Romanian family drama movie directed by Manole Marcus and starring Toma Caragiu, Mircea Albulescu, Tricy Abramovici, Ion Besoiu, Ioana Craciunescu, Mircea Diaconu ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1970s family movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Manole Marcus
title: The Actor and the Savages
